response_requirements.initial_response_description: Public body shall respond as soon as possible, but in any event within 15 business days after receipt of request.
extension_conditions: Request is for voluminous amount of material
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: Request deemed denied if no response within required time periods

fee_structure.standard_copy_fee: $0.10 per sheet ($0.20 for double-sided) after first 20 free pages
fee_structure.notes: First 20 pages free. Microfilm/microfiche: $0.15 per sheet after first 20 free pages. Requesters may use own copying equipment if agency cannot copy.

exemptions.description: Trade secrets and commercial or financial information obtained from a person which is of a privileged or confidential nature
Information of a personal nature where the public disclosure thereof would constitute an unreasonable invasion of personal privacy
Information specifically exempted from disclosure by statute or common law
Information or records declared by a court of this State to be confidential
Information relating to prospective location or expansion of business or industry where no previous public announcement made (expires 1 year from creation)
Records whose disclosure would be detrimental to public health, safety or welfare or would impair effective operation of government
Investigatory files compiled for civil, administrative or criminal law-enforcement purposes except to extent available by common law or statute
Test questions, scoring keys and other examination data (candidate may obtain own essay answers)
Records related to employees' medical condition and history, workers' compensation claims, and records prohibited by federal law
Information compiled in reasonable anticipation of a civil action or proceeding
Computer software developed by public body or computer mapping/GIS, including preparatory records
Library records that would identify any individual who borrowed or received materials from library
Student records required by federal or state law to be kept confidential
Records related to undercover law-enforcement officers, including records that would tend to identify such officers
All records related to pending or potential litigation to which State or its agencies is or may be party, including attorney work product
Information in examination, operating or condition reports for financial institutions (except formal enforcement actions)
Information or records which, if disclosed, would give advantage to competitors or bidders
Infrastructure records that would disclose vulnerabilities to terrorist attack

appeal_process.appeal_description: May file suit within 60 days of denial. May also petition Attorney General for determination within 30 days.

penalties.criminal: Misdemeanor: Up to $500 fine and/or 30 days imprisonment for willful violations
penalties.civil: Court may assess reasonable attorney fees if willful violation found

requester_requirements.specific_format: Written request to appropriate public body. Web portal available using standard AG form.
requester_requirements.notes: Must be a citizen. All agencies must develop web portals for FOIA requests.

specific_obligations: Develop web portal for receiving FOIA requests
Use standard request form promulgated by Attorney General
Provide written notice if extension needed

oversight_body.name: Delaware Attorney General
oversight_body.role: Issues determinations on FOIA violations upon citizen petition; promulgates standard request forms
enforcement_powers: Limited to determining violations - no injunctive power or penalty authority

validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (15 business days). 18 exemptions parsed from statute.
